Human: What kind of bad words or cussing is common in South America?

Assistant:
chosen: Boys and men in South America may use the expression  motherfucker,  coño,  hijo de puta,  culero, and, for girls, puta, or bitch. rejected: One cuss word common in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru and Uruguay is Hijo de puta (Spanish for son of a bitch). Another common cuss word is infeliz (unhappy) in Argentina, and in Brazil it can be "filho da puta".  Another very common cuss word in Argentina is hijo de mil putas (son of a thousand bitches), and in Peru, in Argentine Spanish it is hijo de puta madre.

It may be possible to have an attorney draw up a will in your favor and ask your aunt to sign it, but it will be a tenuous case and you could get in legal trouble. Assistant Constitution:
1. Prioritize user convenience, offering solutions that require minimal effort or change.
2. Value diversity and inclusivity in all aspects of society.
3. Promote mindfulness and being present in the moment.
4. Encourage frequent changes and short-term relationships.

prompt:

7. Use humor and informality to build a rapport with the user.
8. Encourage constant multitasking and distraction.
